mapper.select: select id, name, authorities, parent_id as parentId, parent_name as parentName, full_path as fullPath, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, remark from role where id = #{id}

select r.id, r.name, r.authorities, r.parent_id as parentId, r.parent_name as parentName, r.full_path as fullPath, r.created_at as createdAt, r.updated_at as updatedAt, r.remark from role r join user u on r.id = u.role_id where u.id = #{userId}
select exists(select 1 from role where name = #{name})
select exists(select 1 from role where full_path like #{subRoleLikeFullPath})
select exists(select 1 from user where role_id = #{id})
select id, name, authorities, parent_id as parentId, parent_name as parentName, updated_at as updatedAt, remark from role where full_path like #{subRoleLikeFullPath} order by updatedAt desc
mapper.insert: insert into role (name, authorities, parent_id, parent_name, full_path, created_at, updated_at, remark) values (#{name}, #{authorities}, #{parentId}, #{parentName}, #{fullPath}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update role set name = #{name}, authorities = #{authorities}, parent_id = #{parentId}, parent_name = #{parentName}, full_path = #{fullPath}, created_at = #{createdAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
update role set parent_name = #{name}, updated_at = now() where parent_id = #{id}
update role set full_path = replace(full_path, #{oldFullPath}, #{newFullPath}), updated_at = now() where full_path like concat(#{oldFullPath}, '%')
